snippet: A new series of works by Jasper Johns — who was inspired by a 1960s photograph of Lucian Freud — is coming to the Museum of Modern Art.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; new series of works by Jasper Johns, who was inspired by 1960s photograph of Lucian Freud, is set for exhibition at Museum of Modern Art; Neue Galerie makes last-minute addition to show, Degenerate Art: The Attack on Modern Art in Nazi Germany, 1937 to include only known inventory of modern works reviled by Nazis and confiscated from German museums in 1937-38, Vol 1 of Entartete Kunst (Degenerate Art); Sotheby's manages to win group of three works being sold by collectors Marc and Jane Nathanson.
lead_paragraph: A new series of works by Jasper Johns — who was inspired by a 1960s photograph of Lucian Freud — is coming to the Museum of Modern Art.

headline.main: MoMA to Show Jasper Johns’s ‘Regrets’ Series
headline.print_headline: MoMA to Show Jasper Johns’s ‘Regrets’ Series
